org.upmc.electisim

Class Preferences

  • Object
    • Preferences

  • public class Preferences
extends Object
    The preferences of an agent in the simulation. The preferences can be of different types contained in PreferenceType and are generally represented as a list of electable entities. The preferences can also be completed using a preference completer (TODO : rather unused for now, the API need amendements).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Build the preferences from a type, a list and a preference completer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Preferences

        public Preferences(PreferenceType type)
        Build preferences from a type. The preference list will thus be empty and the preference completer will be the default one org.upmc.electisim.IncrementalPreferenceCompleter
        Parameters:
        type - the preference type

      • Preferences

        public Preferences(PreferenceType type,
                   List<IElectable> prefList)
        Build preferences from a type and a list of preferences. The preference completer will be the default one completer will be the default one org.upmc.electisim.IncrementalPreferenceCompleter
        Parameters:
        type - the preference type
        prefList - the list to use to represent the preferences
